diff_classifier.knotlets.download_and_calc_MSDs(prefix)[source]¶
diff_classifier.knotlets.download_and_split(filename)[source]¶
diff_classifier.knotlets.download_and_track(filename)[source]¶
diff_classifier.knotlets.download_split_track_msds(prefix)[source]¶
  1. Checks to see if features file exists.
  2. If not, checks to see if image partitioning has occured.
  3. If yes, checks to see if tracking has occured.
  4. Regardless, tracks, calculates MSDs and features.
